org.araneaframework.framework.filter
Class StandardMessagingFilterWidget

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.core.BaseWidget
              org.araneaframework.framework.core.BaseFilterWidget
                  org.araneaframework.framework.filter.StandardMessagingFilterWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, FilterWidget, MessageContext, Serializable, Service, UpdateRegionProvider, Widget
public class StandardMessagingFilterWidget
extends BaseFilterWidget
implements MessageContext

Adds a MessageContext implementation to the environment that can be used to add messages for later output.

An example how to add messages to the context follows: 

 
 ...
 MessageContext messageContext = (MessageContext)getEnvironment().get(CallContext.class);
 messageContext.addMessage(MessageContext.INFO_TYPE, "Hello message!");

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer" , Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org), Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)

getMessages

public Map getMessages()
Description copied from interface: MessageContext
Returns all messages as a Map. The keys of the Map are the different message types encountered so far and under the keys are the messages in a Collection.

A child service should do as follows to access the messages 

 
 ...
 MessageContext msgCtx = (MessageContext) getEnvironment().requireEntry(MessageContext.class);
 Map map = msgCtx.getMessages();
 Collection list = (Collection) map.get(MessageContext.ERROR_TYPE); // collection contains all the error messages
The map could be null if this service was not used. The collection is null if no messages of that type been added to the messages.

Specified by:
getMessages in interface MessageContext

getRegions

public Map getRegions()
Description copied from interface: UpdateRegionProvider
Will be called only when updateregion filter is activated on AJAX requests.

Specified by:
getRegions in interface UpdateRegionProvider
Returns:
map containing regions that will be passed to client-side. Map must have region names as String keys and region contents as String values. Region contents will be passed to client-side Javascript region handler, designated by region name. May return null or empty map. If map contains a null value, then that region is not included in response.
Since:
1.1
